name: Project Cyclops 1995
description:
You're a journalist who breaks into the mysterious Gaea corporation during a protest. Will you be able to uncover the secrets of this place or will you die trying.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • F - Interact
  • J - Journal
  • Mouse - Look
  • QE - Lean
  • Space - Jump
  • CTRL - Crouch

Audio is messed up in browser version, download one of the executables for better audio.

Things we ran out of time to implement:

  • Signs pointing you in the right direction
  • Guards
  • Gadgets (other than the tranquilizer gun)
  • Ending cutscene
